metadata.title: CVE-2016-4566 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in plupload.flash.swf in Plupload before 2.1.9, as used in WordPress before 4.5.2, allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via a Same-Origin Method Execution (SOME) attack.

criterions.comment: wordpress package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.5.2+dfsg-1').
